CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 10, 1962, pg. 5, reads: "Mother Joins Son - Mrs. Geneva Drafts flew to Pittsburgh from Alaska, last week, to be at the bedside of Charles Drafts, her 15-year-old son, who accidentally broke his neck in a swimming meet recently at Schenley High School. Charles has been living with an aunt, Mrs. Mercedes Drafts of 232 Burrows St."
TitMainTitle: Geneva Drafts seated beside son Charles "Buggsy" Drafts in cervical traction medical device in hospital room
